revision.comment: No change required for MAME v0.81.

Updated for M1 v0.7.5a3 (public test).

Updated for M1 v0.7.4b (48 games added).
Updated for M1 v0.7.3 and MAME supplements.
Updated supplements for MAME v0.78.
Updated supplementary dats for MAME v0.77.

Fixed the strange character that was in the place of ampersands!
Changed a few ROM names to be lowercase.

Added Daytona USA (Japan) and Wing War. Updated CRCs for Daytona USA (US).
First release.
